ModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of the modification of the channel.

IngestEndpoints.description: The ingest endpoints associated with the channel.

CreatedAt.description: The timestamp of the creation of the channel.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the channel.

IngestEndpointUrls.description: The ingest domain URL where the source stream should be sent.

Id.description: The identifier associated with the ingest endpoint of the channel.

Url.description: The URL associated with the ingest endpoint of the channel.

IngestEndpoint.description: The input URL where the source stream should be sent.

MQCSInputSwitching.description: When true, AWS Elemental MediaPackage performs input switching based on the MQCS. Default is true. This setting is valid only when `InputType` is `CMAF` .

PreferredInput.description: For CMAF inputs, indicates which input MediaPackage should prefer when both inputs have equal MQCS scores. Select `1` to prefer the first ingest endpoint, or `2` to prefer the second ingest endpoint. If you don't specify a preferred input, MediaPackage uses its default switching behavior when MQCS scores are equal.

InputSwitchConfiguration.description: The configuration for input switching based on the media quality confidence score (MQCS) as provided from AWS Elemental MediaLive.

PublishMQCS.description: When true, AWS Elemental MediaPackage includes the MQCS in responses to the CDN. This setting is valid only when `InputType` is `CMAF` .

OutputHeaderConfiguration.description: The settings for what common media server data (CMSD) headers AWS Elemental MediaPackage includes in responses to the CDN.

description:
Creates a channel to receive content.

After it's created, a channel provides static input URLs. These URLs remain the same throughout the lifetime of the channel, regardless of any failures or upgrades that might occur. Use these URLs to configure the outputs of your upstream encoder.

ChannelGroupName.description: The name of the channel group associated with the channel configuration.

InputSwitchConfiguration.description: The configuration for input switching based on the media quality confidence score (MQCS) as provided from AWS Elemental MediaLive.

InputType.description:
The input type will be an immutable field which will be used to define whether the channel will allow CMAF ingest or HLS ingest. If unprovided, it will default to HLS to preserve current behavior.

The allowed values are:

- `HLS` - The HLS streaming specification (which defines M3U8 manifests and TS segments).
- `CMAF` - The DASH-IF CMAF Ingest specification (which defines CMAF segments with optional DASH manifests).

OutputHeaderConfiguration.description: The settings for what common media server data (CMSD) headers AWS Elemental MediaPackage includes in responses to the CDN.
